Caption: Figure 2. Making HyperspaceFlexible: The MITRE enhancementto NCSA Mosaic enables the user to interactively modify the links among the documentsand images using a point-click-and-drag operation on the display of the hyperlink hierarchical structure. The user can generatenew, personalized links and to view the new and “old” information space globally and locally, The new hyperlinks are stored at the end of the documentsand could be savedfor future viewing and sharing with other users.

Figure 3. Information representation after aggregation. The correlation of words (excluding simple articles and propositions, such as “the,” “by,” and “and,“etc.) in a document was computed (by proximity) and the resulting table was aggregated. The axes are the string of words in the document.
